items.title: Fulham v Liverpool kick-off delayed, Newcastle v Crystal Palace and more: clockwatch ‚Äì live
items.summary: Updates from 3pm (GMT) Premier League games Morocco v Tanzania at 4pm (GMT) | Email Tom With Portsmouth v Ipswich postponed, a win for Middlesbrough will see them go up to second in the Championship and six points behind Coventry. That Birmingham v Coventry game was a wild ride. Five goals, one red card and at the end of it the league leaders lose their second game in three. Continue reading...

items.title: Aaronson scores as Leeds hold Man United
items.summary: Matheus Cunha cancelled out Brenden Aaronson's strike as Ruben Amorim's Manchester United and rivals Leeds fought out a tense 1-1 draw at rocking Elland Road.

items.title: Rice on Gy√∂keres: Wouldn't be top without him
items.summary: Declan Rice has defended goal-shy Viktor Gy√∂keres, claiming Arsenal will not be able to end their 22-year wait for a Premier League title without him.

items.title: Galaxy star Riqui Puig out until '27 after setback
items.summary: LA Galaxy star Riqui Puig's return from injury has been delayed until 2027, the LA Galaxy said Saturday after confirming that the midfielder underwent another anterior cruciate ligament reconstructive surgery on his left knee.

items.title: 'Unbelievable' Garc√≠a leads Bar√ßa to derby triumph
items.summary: Barcelona coach thanked Joan Garc√≠a for an unbelievable performance as the goalkeeper dealt with a hostile reception on his return to Espanyol to help the LaLiga leaders seal a 2-0 win at the RCDE Stadium on Saturday.

items.title: Amorim refuses to clarify 'time and money' claim
items.summary: Ruben Amorim has declined to expand on his claim that it will take "time and money" to make his system work at Manchester United.

items.title: VI Live: Liverpool met Gakpo als spits begonnen tegen Fulham
items.summary: In deze VI Live volgen we de hoogtepunten in verschillende competities. Met onder meer aandacht voor Leeds United - Manchester United, Fulham - Liverpool, de Afrika Cup en Real Madrid - Real Betis.

items.title: Titelstress bij Coventry City: Lampard gaat opnieuw onderuit
items.summary: Coventry City heeft opnieuw een deuk opgelopen in de strijd om de koppositie in het Championship. De ploeg van Frank Lampard (foto) verloor met 3-2 van Birmingham City. Al is er niet meteen iets aan de hand voor Coventry.

items.title: Matheus Cunha earns Manchester United point as Leeds keep up unbeaten run
items.summary: Leeds and Manchester United played out a somewhat low-key draw despite a ferocious Elland Road atmosphere which probably helps the respective ambitions of both teams this season. One of English football‚Äôs most hostile and bitter rivalries did not quite have the bite or edge to it that historical editions have had, but Daniel Farke‚Äôs side continued to show why Leeds can be increasingly confident of this fixture being on the Premier League calendar again next season. Continue reading...

items.title: 'When has it ever been this bad?' - McCowan haunted by Celtic form
items.summary: Luke McCowan asks "when has it ever been this bad?" in the wake of Celtic's 3-1 home defeat by Rangers on Saturday.

items.title: 'Special' Moore always stood out - Defoe
items.summary: Former Ibrox forward Jermain Defoe played a role in Mikey Moore arriving at Ibrox.

items.title: Man Utd held by Leeds after Cunha cancels out Aaronson strike
items.summary: Manchester United were held to a 1-1 draw at Elland Road as bitter rivals Leeds extended their unbeaten run to seven games.

items.title: Manchester United verspeelt weer punten ondanks assist Zirkzee
items.summary: Manchester United is het jaar 2026 slecht begonnen. Het sloot het jaar 2025 af met een remise tegen hekkensluiter Wolverhampton Wanderers, maar verspeelde ook direct punten tegen Leeds United: 1-1.

items.title: FC Volendam laat Chelsea-huurling na 26 speelminuten vertrekken
items.summary: FC Volendam heeft vervroegd afscheid genomen van Kiano Dyer. De negentienjarige middenvelder keert per direct terug naar Chelsea.

items.title: Noodweer in Marbella: ook middagtraining Feyenoord afgelast
items.summary: De selectie van Feyenoord zou zondagochtend een training afwerken in Marbella, maar vanwege het slechte weer in Zuid-Spanje gaat dat niet door. De selectie is naar binnen gegaan en werkt een training af in de gym.

items.title: Nuno Esp√≠rito Santo is losing support of West Ham squad as morale deteriorates
items.summary: Player concern over man-management and tactics Hammers host Forest in crucial game on Tuesday Nuno Esp√≠rito Santo is in danger of losing the support of West Ham‚Äôs squad because of concerns over his man-management and tactics. The east London club are at increasing risk of relegation from the Premier League after their 3-0 defeat by Wolves on Saturday and it is understood that the mood at the London Stadium is rapidly deteriorating. Nuno has struggled badly since replacing Graham Potter in September, winning only two of his 15 games in charge, and is under growing pressure before Tuesday‚Äôs crunch game against his former side, Nottingham Forest. The indications are that West Ham, who are in 18th place and lie four points below Forest, will stick with their manager but his methods are coming under increased scrutiny. Continue reading...

items.title: Sheff Utd & Pompey fixtures among EFL games off
items.summary: Two of Sunday's Championship matches are postponed because of frozen pitches, with a number of others called off elsewhere in the EFL.

items.title: Who has qualified for Premier League Darts and who's in contention?
items.summary: World No 1 Luke Littler and defending champion Luke Humphries will headline this year's Premier League Darts, but who will join them?
